rj.tools.jcsc
Class TriStateBoolean

java.lang.Object
  rj.tools.jcsc.TriStateBoolean
public class TriStateBoolean
extends java.lang.Object

TriStateBoolean is a boolean which can have three states - true, false, either.

Version:
__0.98.1__
Author:
Ralph Jocham
